markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 2" pfs="Limited">
[Pack Attack](/Spells.aspx?ID=1095)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 80

**Traditions**
[Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** you and 1 willing creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You and one other target gain an uncanny coordination that helps you take down foes. You and the other target flank any enemy to which you are both adjacent, whether or not you are on opposite sides of the enemy's space.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The spell can target you and up to 4 willing creatures touched.
name: Pack Attack
